name: Car Highway Rush:Road Race
description:
Car Highway Rush:Road Race is the newly developed and designed car racing game as the user is supposed to drive world famous hot wheels on legendary highway tracks. Burn the tires out and unleash the rage for super speed highway racing on adrenaline fast tracks with best automobiles.

Features:
-Drive with highway traffic
- Amazing 3d graphics
- Accurate physics controls
- Realistic racer cars
- Realistic prado car driving experience
- Easy to play
